column1: Table 2.   Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system by level of government, March 2009 (final)
Series title:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts 2009, NCJ 247018
Data source:  Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (JEE)
Table 2.   Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system by level of government, March 2009 (revised)
Notes:  Local government data are estimates subject to sampling variability.

The Federal Budget source provides only total employment for the Federal Government; that figure is included in the denominator used to compute the percent distribution of full time employees and full time equivalent employment for state and local governments.
